thread.section_title: Backcountry Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Backcountry Gear | backcountrygear.com
thread.title: Jane

author: Jane
title: Jane
text: We live in snow country. The only way I could walk my dog these last months has been on snowshoes. But then between storms, the snow packs down and becomes icy. Previously I have used rubber stabilizers and Yaxtrax and not found them satisfactory. My husband, who is climbing the 4000 footers in winter, recently introduced me to Kahtoola microspikes, and they are the best footwear ever for packed snow . This is what I will be wearing for the rest of this winter and many winters to come!!
